control

Class ManuscriptControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.ManuscriptControl

  • public class ManuscriptControl
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that communicates with the database to store/retrieve data. The Connection object this class uses is globally shared and thus is retrieved via JDBCConnection. (UNDER TEST: Also stores a Map of all Manuscript objects already loaded into memory to prevent duplication. Also stores a Map of all Review objects in a similar fashion.) Helpful reference: https://developer.salesforce.com/page/Secure_Coding_SQL_Injection
    Version:
    6.04.14
    Author:
    Kirsten Grace

    • Method Detail

      • createManuscript

        public static int createManuscript(Manuscript theManuscript)
        Use this method to submit a freshly created manuscript to the database and retrieve its unique ID number. Do NOT use this method to update a manuscript that has already been submitted to the database previously. If an error is encountered and no ID is generated, a value of -1 is returned instead.
        Parameters:
        theManuscript - The java object representation of a manuscript.
        Returns:
        The unique ID of the newly added manuscript.

      • updateManuscript

        public static java.lang.String updateManuscript(Manuscript theManuscript)
        Use this method to update a manuscript in the database after one of it's fields has been changed. The manuscript MUST have its ID number correctly set or the update will have unintended results. If an error is encountered, the error message will be returned as a String. If no error is encountered, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        theManuscript - the java object representation of the manuscript
        Returns:
        The error message encountered or null if no error is encountered

      • addReviewer

        public static void addReviewer(Manuscript theManuscript,
               User theReviewer)
        This method will add a relation between the user and the manuscript within the database that indicates they are a reviewer for this manuscript.
        Parameters:
        theManuscript - The manuscript to add the reviewer to.
        theReviewer - The user to be added as a reviewer.

      • updateRecommend

        public static java.lang.String updateRecommend(Manuscript theManuscript,
                               Status theStatus)
        This method will update the recommend status for the specified manuscript in the database. (To be called by Manuscript's setRecommendStatus() method) Returns the error message as a String if an error is encountered. Returns null if no error is encountered.
        Parameters:
        theManuscript - The manuscript to be updated.
        theStatus - The new Status to be set for this manuscript.

      • updateFinal

        public static java.lang.String updateFinal(Manuscript theManuscript,
                           Status theStatus)
        This method will update the final status for the specified manuscript in the database. (To be called by Manuscript's setFinalStatus() method) Returns the error message as a String if an error is encountered. Returns null if no error is encountered.
        Parameters:
        theManuscript - The manuscript to be updated.
        theStatus - The new Status to be set for this manuscript.

      • updateSPC

        public static java.lang.String updateSPC(Manuscript theManuscript,
                         User theSPC)
        This method will update the SPC assigned to the specified manuscript in the database. (To be called by Manuscript's assignSPC() method) Note: If an older SPC was assigned and now being overwritten, it will NOT delete the "relationship" this older SPC had with the manuscript. Returns the error message as a String if an error is encountered. Returns null if no error is encountered.
        Parameters:
        theManuscript - The manuscript to be updated.
        theSPC - The user to be set as the sub program chair.

      • getManuscripts

        public static java.util.List<Manuscript> getManuscripts(Conference theConference,
                                        User theUser)
        Returns list of manuscripts in this conference that this user has 'access' to. A user has access if they are: The author of the manuscript, a reviewer for a manuscript, the sub program chair for the manuscript or the program chair for this conference. Note: This will return all manuscripts for the conference indicated if the given user is the program chair of that conference. Returns an empty list if no manuscripts exist for this criteria.
        Parameters:
        theConference - The conference that the requested manuscripts are part of
        theUser - The user being used as a filter for the manuscripts
        Returns:
        A list of manuscripts the user has access to for this conference

      • getManuscripts

        public static java.util.List<Manuscript> getManuscripts(Conference theConference,
                                        User theUser,
                                        AccessLevel theAccessLevel)
        Returns list of manuscripts in this conference for this user and AccessLevel. Returns an empty list if no manuscripts exist for this criteria.
        Parameters:
        theConference - The conference that the requested manuscripts are part of
        theUser - The user being used as a filter for the manuscripts
        Returns:
        A list of manuscripts the user has access to for this conference

      • getAcceptedManuscripts

        public static java.util.List<Manuscript> getAcceptedManuscripts(Conference theConference)
        Returns list of manuscripts in this conference that have final status of APPROVED. If no manuscripts match this criteria, an empty list is returned instead.
        Parameters:
        theConference - The conference these manuscripts are attached to.
        Returns:
        A list of manuscripts with approved status for the given conference.

      • getUnassignedSPC

        public static java.util.List<Manuscript> getUnassignedSPC(Conference theConference)
        Returns list of manuscripts in this conference with SPC field marked as NULL. If no manuscripts match this criteria, an empty list is returned instead.
        Parameters:
        theConference - The conference to get unassigned SPCs for.
        Returns:
        The list of manuscripts with unassigned SPCs

      • getManuscriptByID

        public static Manuscript getManuscriptByID(int theKey)
        Returns a single Manuscript object by it's unique ID. If no Manuscript exists by this ID, returns null.
        Parameters:
        theKey - The ID of the manuscript requested
        Returns:
        The manuscript that matches the given ID

      • getReviewers

        public static java.util.List<User> getReviewers(Manuscript theManuscript)
        Returns the list of users marked as reviewers for the manuscript. If the manuscript has no reviewers yet, an empty list is returned instead.
        Parameters:
        theManuscript - The manuscript that the list of reviewers is for
        Returns:
        The list of reviewers assigned to this manuscript

      • createReview

        public static int createReview(Review theReview)
        Use this method to submit a freshly created review to the database and retrieve its unique ID number. Do NOT use this method to update a review that has already been submitted to the database previously. If an error is encountered and no ID is generated, a value of -1 is returned instead.
        Parameters:
        theReview - The java object representation of a review.
        Returns:
        The unique ID of the newly added review.

      • updateReview

        public static java.lang.String updateReview(Review theReview)
        Use this method to update a review in the database after a field has changed. The review MUST have its ID number correctly set or the update will have unintended results. If an error is encountered, the error message will be returned as a String. If no error is encountered, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        theReview - The java object representation of the review
        Returns:
        The error message encountered or null if no error is encountered

      • getReviews

        public static java.util.List<Review> getReviews(Manuscript theManuscript,
                                User theUser)
        Returns list of reviews for this manuscript that this user has 'access' to. A user has access if they are: The user who wrote the review, the author of the manuscript, the sub program chair for the manuscript or the program chair for this conference. Note: This will return all reviews for the manuscript indicated if the given user is the program chair of that conference or is the sub program chair assigned to the manuscript. Returns an empty list if no reviews exist for this criteria.
        Parameters:
        theManuscript - The manuscript that the requested reviews are part of
        theUser - The user being used as a filter for the reviews
        Returns:
        A list of reviews the user has access to for this manuscript

      • getReviews

        public static java.util.List<Review> getReviews(Manuscript theManuscript)
        Returns list of all of the reviews for this manuscript. Returns an empty list if no reviews exist for this manuscript.
        Parameters:
        theManuscript - The manuscript that the requested reviews are part of
        Returns:
        A list of all of the reviews for this manuscript

      • getReviewByID

        public static Review getReviewByID(int theKey)
        Returns a single Review object by it's unique ID. Returns null if no reviews match this criteria.
        Parameters:
        theKey - The ID of the review requested
        Returns:
        The review that matches the given ID
